app.name: Map Brief
app.tagline: Draw Your Thoughts and Memories on the Map

hero.title: Draw Your Thoughts and Memories on the Map
hero.subtitle: Sometimes, simply saving a location isn't enough. Details like "Enter through this alley for the entrance" or "The view is best from this exact spot" are hard to capture with text alone.
hero.description: Map Brief is the most intuitive map recording app that lets you sketch directly on the map with a pen and pin photos to specific spots to capture the moment.

drawing.title: Freeform Map Drawing
drawing.description: Draw paths, zones, and notes freely on the map using your Apple Pencil or finger. Intuitively visualize complex directions, hiking trails, or your personal walking courses.

photoMarker.title: Vivid Photo Markers
photoMarker.description: Drag and drop photos to pin them to specific locations. Check restaurant menus, travel sceneries, or site conditions exactly where they happened on the map.

mapModes.title: Various Map Modes
mapModes.description: Choose the map that fits your needs, from clean standard maps for clarity to immersive satellite views for reality.

foodie.title: Foodie Explorers
foodie.description: Those who want to build their own restaurant map complete with menu photos.

traveler.title: Travel Planners
traveler.description: Those who want to visually organize travel routes and key spots.

surveyor.title: Field & Site Surveyors
surveyor.description: Those who need to note real estate locations or site specifics directly on the map.

home.cta: Complete your own personal map with Map Brief today.

items.question: What devices is Map Brief available on?
items.answer: Map Brief is currently available on iOS devices (iPhone, iPad). Using an iPad with Apple Pencil enables more precise drawing capabilities.

items.question: Can I use it offline?
items.answer: Yes, saved map data can be viewed offline. However, loading new map areas requires an internet connection.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: All data is stored locally on your device. Cloud sync features will be available in future updates.

items.question: Can I export or share my map data?
items.answer: Yes, you can export your maps as images or backup the data as files.

items.question: Is it free to use?
items.answer: The basic features of Map Brief are available for free.

bugReport.title: Bug Report
bugReport.description: Please let us know about any bugs or issues you encounter while using Map Brief. Your feedback helps us improve the app.

howTo.title: How to Report a Bug
steps: Describe the problem in as much detail as possible
Explain the situation when the problem occurred (what action triggered it)
Include your device model and iOS version
If possible, attach screenshots or screen recordings

intro.title: Overview
intro.content: Map Brief (the 'App') values your privacy and complies with applicable privacy laws. This Privacy Policy explains what information the App collects and how it is used.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: The App collects only minimal information necessary to provide its services.
items: Location Information: We may collect your current location to provide map features (only with your consent)
Photos: We access selected photos for the photo marker feature (only with your consent)
Usage Data: We may collect anonymized usage statistics to improve the app

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: All map data, drawings, and notes you create are stored locally on your device. The current version does not transmit data to external servers.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: The App does not share your personal information with third parties. However, we may provide information as required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You can delete your data from the app at any time. Deleting the app will also delete all data stored on your device.

changes.title: Policy Changes
